attributes.title: HORRENDOUS
attributes.review: This is the first complaint I’ve ever wrote for an app but this is the most poorly designed app I’ve ever seen. It truly is laughable. So many problems and bugs that lead to having it crashing constantly. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. EVER.

attributes.title: bad
attributes.review: terrible app, the worst app, and I know apps. this one, not a good app. it could be great, but it’s not. there are so many wonderful apps, I have had many many apps, some would say i am an app expert, idk. this app terrible.

attributes.title: gen z is more powerful then you think trumpet .
attributes.review: okay so , i was at walmart right , and all of a sudden a meteor crashed into walmart and everything fought on fire . my pet giraffe ended up carrying everyone to safety and then we went and got chipotle . i like chipotle . then an elephant crashed into chipotle and ate all the food there was . we rode the elephant around and into the white house and trumpet was there so let’s just say he lost the gulag . the end ❤️

attributes.title: Disappointment
attributes.review: I got this app to support our spray tanned president, but I got treated with a bombardment of pop ups and glitches and confusing layouts. Certainly not something I love to see. Don't recommend this to anyone!!

attributes.title: TRASH APP 🙄
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I really love my daddy trump but i don’t know if it’s because I am Mexican..... buttttt it didn’t work 💔 it gave me a massage to go back to my country 😢💔 anyways hated the app hope daddy trump fixes the bug love you bae 😍😍 trump 2020

attributes.title: encourages the spread of misinformation
attributes.review: This app promotes the following of Trump’s twitter accounts. The majority of the information shared on those pages is highly misrepresentative of reality, further stoking the fires of partisanship. Apple should remove this app to encourage voters to consume unbiased media and factual reporting.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Ever time I would go to open this app there was a creepy old man looking at me after so many times I just could not stand this app this is by far the worst app ever!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I tried to download this app to see all the updates from our ~wonderful~ President, but I was completely bombarded with white supremacy and Nazi symbols, alerts, etc. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: This app is so bad. It crashed when I opened it, slowed by entire phone down, locked my children in a cage, and stole all my money. Don’t get this app. It’s one of the worst things ever created on here

attributes.title: This app scares me
attributes.review: Every time I open the app it tells me to login to something but I don’t know what I’m logging into like is this unknown man named Donald trump trying to watch me if I log in if so I’m very scared like the instructions are unclear
